page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There are some 200 people in full time employment in Staindrop and around 20 people in part time employment. Most of these people are employed in service insustries. The largest employer is Durham County Council with 70 people working as teachers and ancillary staff at the local comprehensive and primary schools. The staff travel from as far away as Hexham Northallerton and Teeside. The second largest employer is the Raby Estate which accounts for around 50 people, mostly local showing that the livelyhood of the village is still very much tied up with the castle. 12 people from a radius of 10 miles of Staindrop are employed at a resi- -dential home for the elderly. a vintage motorcar retorers employs 11 people from a 10 mile radius.This small business has been established
